attributes.action: To vacinate every lady and gentleman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gardasil is to be given to girls and women between the ages of nine and 26. The vaccine protects against certain strains of Human Papillomavirus (HPV) which is implicated in the development of cervical cancer. we are campaigning so that every lady and gentleman in the u.k. is vaccinated so they can also have the same protection against HPV

rejection.details: This petition is fine, but the main sentence needs to be more explicit. E.g. We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to "vaccinate all UK citizens against certain strains of Human Papillomavirus (HPV) which is implicated in the development of cervical cancer."
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
